recipe.title: French Toast
recipe.description: Golden eggy bread with cinnamon and maple syrup

steps.descr: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla
steps.instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla

on_enter.say: Right, let's whisk together the eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla until it's all beautifully combined.

steps.descr: Dip bread slices in egg mixture
steps.instructions: Dip bread slices in egg mixture

on_enter.say: Now, let's dip those lovely thick slices of bread into our eggy mixture. Make sure they're nicely coated but not too soggy.
Let's get that butter melting in the pan. You want it to sizzle gently, not burn.

steps.descr: Fry bread until golden on both sides
steps.instructions: Fry bread until golden on both sides

on_enter.say: Time to fry the bread. We're looking for a gorgeous golden colour on both sides. You'll know it's ready when it smells divine.

steps.descr: Keep warm in oven while cooking remaining slices
steps.instructions: Keep warm in oven while cooking remaining slices

on_enter.say: Let's pop those golden beauties in the oven to keep warm while we cook the rest.
Right, let's stack those slices up on the plates. Looking good already!

steps.descr: Drizzle with maple syrup and top with fresh berries
steps.instructions: Drizzle with maple syrup and top with fresh berries

on_enter.say: Now for the finishing touch - drizzle over some lovely maple syrup and top with fresh berries. Absolutely delicious!

notes.text: Stale bread works best. Don't oversoak or bread will fall apart. Add a pinch of nutmeg for extra flavor.
